5094.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|136|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|116|84$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|101|79$وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ|and His Messengers,|155|189|926$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|[those]|82|116|51$هُمُ|they|50|67|56$ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَ‌ۖ|(are) the truthful|134|142|16665$وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ|and the martyrs,|131|147|16666$عِندَ|(are) with|86|102|521$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord.|88|104|54$لَهُمْ|For them|79|95|98$أَجْرُهُمْ|(is) their reward|127|135|624$وَنُورُهُمْ‌ۖ|and their light.|117|131|16667$وَٱلَّذِينَ|But those who|116|144|42$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|112|59$وَكَذَّبُواْ|and deny|87|115|407$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|Our Verses,|97|125|408$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|96|51$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|356|409$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire.|126|320|1107$

5095.verse: ٱعْلَمُوٓاْ|Know|85|91|5272$أَنَّمَا|that|55|67|3535$ٱلْحَيَوٲةُ|the life|82|94|1847$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|124|818$لَعِبٌ|(is) play|74|86|5532$وَلَهْوٌ|and amusement|124|136|5533$وَزِينَةٌ|and adornment|119|125|16668$وَتَفَاخُرُۢ|and boasting|105|128|16669$بَيْنَكُمْ|among you|92|139|1657$وَتَكَاثُرٌ|and competition in increase|202|249|16670$فِى|of|48|95|89$ٱلْأَمْوَٲلِ|the wealth|91|114|1367$وَٱلْأَوْلَـٰدِ‌ۖ|and the children,|132|142|10444$كَمَثَلِ|like (the) example|138|159|137$غَيْثٍ|(of) a rain,|92|113|16671$أَعْجَبَ|pleases|84|105|16672$ٱلْكُفَّارَ|the tillers|82|103|7748$نَبَاتُهُۥ|its growth;|93|103|6480$ثُمَّ|then|50|57|293$يَهِيجُ|it dries|65|80|14959$فَتَرَٮٰهُ|and you see it|115|130|14960$مُصْفَرًّا|turning yellow;|118|133|13770$ثُمَّ|then|50|65|293$يَكُونُ|becomes|78|93|2833$حُطَـٰمًا‌ۖ|debris.|83|98|14961$وَفِى|And in|62|69|487$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|the Hereafter|109|115|978$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|147|72$شَدِيدٌ|severe|67|79|2613$وَمَغْفِرَةٌ|and forgiveness|124|136|2372$مِّنَ|from|50|62|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|65|606$وَرِضْوَٲنٌ‌ۚ|and Pleasure.|115|121|2687$وَمَا|But not|69|79|46$ٱلْحَيَوٲةُ|(is) the life|93|113|1847$ٱلدُّنْيَآ|(of) the world|112|132|818$إِلَّا|except|65|85|86$مَتَـٰعُ|(the) enjoyment|128|148|2681$ٱلْغُرُورِ|(of) delusion.|108|118|3585$

5096.verse: سَابِقُوٓاْ|Race|81|91|16673$إِلَىٰ|to|53|72|118$مَغْفِرَةٍ|(the) forgiveness|134|153|3274$مِّن|from|50|69|53$رَّبِّكُمْ|your Lord,|87|106|490$وَجَنَّةٍ|and a Garden|108|127|3275$عَرْضُهَا|its width|97|107|3276$كَعَرْضِ|(is) like (the) width|148|154|16674$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|(of) the heaven|125|138|157$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth,|116|129|352$أُعِدَّتْ|prepared|78|91|235$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|125|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|88|84$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|83|79$وَرُسُلِهِۦ‌ۚ|and His Messengers.|155|186|926$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|95|28$فَضْلُ|(is the) Bounty|120|151|4248$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|117|606$يُؤْتِيهِ|He gives|76|92|3010$مَن|(to) whom|89|105|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|106|867$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|114|167$ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ|(is) the Possessor of Bounty,|213|246|995$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Great.|88|104|996$

5099.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|103|20$يَبْخَلُونَ|are stingy|91|114|3547$وَيَأْمُرُونَ|and enjoin|109|132|3144$ٱلنَّاسَ|(on) the people|123|146|446$بِٱلْبُخْلِ‌ۗ|stinginess.|90|113|3990$وَمَن|And whoever|106|117|1012$يَتَوَلَّ|turns away,|99|109|5072$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|122|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|75|184$هُوَ|He|48|67|298$ٱلْغَنِىُّ|(is) Free of need,|136|155|6053$ٱلْحَمِيدُ|the Praiseworthy.|137|147|12168$

5094.verse: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.

5095.verse: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.

5096.verse: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

5097.verse: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -

5098.verse: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -

5099.verse: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
